item.itunes:summary: 🏴スコットランドのニュースを🇯🇵日本語に翻訳し、月曜から金曜まで毎日配信。独自のニュース解説もつけています。
item.description:
🏴スコットランドのニュースを🇯🇵日本語に翻訳し、月曜から金曜まで毎日配信。独自のニュース解説もつけています。
1. Dummy Title JA Christie wants to cap 'incredible season' with club and country https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/articles/cm2dmn1prnlo
2. Dummy Title JA Rachel Reeves denies austerity as Labour plans 15% civil service cuts https://www.heraldscotland.com/news/25030137.rachel-reeves-confirms-plans-civil-service-cuts/?ref=rss
3. Dummy Title JA Sinkhole discovered on Cowcaddens Road as drivers warned of ‘significant delays’ https://news.stv.tv/west-central/sinkhole-discovered-on-cowcaddens-road-as-drivers-warned-of-significant-delays
4. Dummy Title JA Your pictures of Scotland: 14 - 21 March https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cedl48l5edno
5. Dummy Title JA Scotland's wettest city now has its own sunscreen—But why? https://www.heraldscotland.com/news/25028013.one-glaswegian-marketing-spf-scotlands-wettest-city/?ref=rss
6. Dummy Title JA Neon lights, flat roofs, balconies: how Art Deco gave metropolitan style to Scotland https://www.heraldscotland.com/news/25023239.scotland-fell-love-art-deco-style/?ref=rss
7. Dummy Title JA More than 400,000 paramedic hours lost due to mental ill health https://news.stv.tv/scotland/more-than-400000-paramedic-hours-lost-due-to-mental-ill-health
8. Dummy Title JA Campaigners renew efforts to renew historic Jacob’s Ladder staircase in Aberdeen https://news.stv.tv/north/campaigners-renew-efforts-to-renew-historic-jacobs-ladder-staircase-in-aberdeen
